description: Try our easy to follow Grilled Peach Gratin recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Grilled Peach Gratin Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the grill to the highest setting. Halve peaches, discarding stone. Lay on a baking tray - you may like to cut a small slice from the rounded side so that they will sit flat. Pile biscuit mixture onto peaches and grill until golden. Serve with cream or thick yoghurt.
